titles.title: To authorize the honorary appointment of Robert J. Dole to the grade of colonel in the regular Army.
To authorize the honorary appointment of Robert J. Dole to the grade of colonel in the regular Army.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary: This bill provides for the honorary appointment of Robert J. Dole, of Kansas, to the grade of colonel in the regular Army.
